name: multi_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool genius_song_lyrics.
Tool description: Genius - Song Lyrics, Artists, Albums, Knowledge & More API
API description: Performs a multi-search on Genius based on the given query, returning paginated results.

per_page.description: The number of results to return per request. Defaults to 3.

text_format.description: The format for text bodies related to the document. Can be one or more of `dom`, `plain`, `markdown`, and `html`, separated by commas. Defaults to None.
